column1: 220000 lives lost to COVID.   But President Trump still won't stop lying.
Over 180000 Americans have died from COVID-19.  There have been almost 6 million cases.  27 million are relying on unemployment assistance.  America Donald Trump has quit on you.
The CDC recommends wearing masks and practicing social distancing to help stop the spread of COVID-19 to others. https://t.co/9UgROb61YX

As the head of the Coronavirus Task Force Vice President Pence's response and the response of the Trump-Pence administration to COVID-19 is a severe indictment that will be a stain on his record forever. https://t.co/5A7Ni3oWsw

The Trump administration’s health care sabotage and weak inadequate coronavirus response has been aided and abetted by Congressional Republicans.  We are fighting to elect Joe Biden elect Kamala Harris and #FlipTheSenate.  https://t.co/ZxhXXzNzWn

Donald Trump made his name in reality TV but their convention has been more like Sur-reality TV.  Over 170000 Americans have died from COVID but they pretend Donald Trump has a handle on the virus.  Republicans have spent their convention trying to Papier-mâché over this.
Things not mentioned tonight at the RNC:  There are over 177000 Americans who have lost their lives to COVID-19 yet Donald Trump still doesn’t have a national testing strategy.

With President Biden Vice President Harris and a Democratic Senate Majority:  We’ll rebuild our infrastructure and make sure every home from inner city to rural America has broadband.  We will save the post office and once and for all defeat COVID-19 this evil disease.

Donald Trump has divided our country and diminished our greatness.  He hid in a bunker as Americans were tear gassed and beaten.  Millions are jobless. 170000 have died from COVID.  And Donald Trump says: “it is what it is.”
